levelDescription: With the torch in hand, you can make out the end of the hallway in front of you. You hear a faint sobbing.
In the room, there is a desk with a wooden chair and a torch hanging on the wall. It seems the torch isn't bolted to the wall, you might be able to pick it up.
As you enter the hallway, you see there's corridors to the left, right and in front of you. The sobbing becomes ever so clearer.
As you hold your torch up, you catch a glimpse of something shining in front of you down the corridor but the faint sobbing subsides.
On the floor, there is a rusty key in front of your feet
As you hold your torch up you catch a glimpse of something shining to the left of you down the corridor.
The sobbing increases, you can hear it in both your ears.
As you walk forwards the sobbing increases. In front of you is a closed metal gate, to your right is a damp room.
In the room there's a keyhole on the opposite side of the gate.
